h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Captain Kalpa-Wave
content: What really makes Kalpa-Wave unique is his ability to spew blood out. Lots of it. This can take on many forms, and you'll need to know how to deal with each of them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Captain Kalpa-Wave'.
The content is as follows:
What really makes Kalpa-Wave unique is his ability to spew blood out. Lots of it. This can take on many forms, and you'll need to know how to deal with each of them.
